name: Neon Surfer (Futuregames)
description: "Neon Surfer is a 3D third person racing platformer game made for a tween audience ready for a challenge. The player takes control of their own surfer-board with a solar sail hovering above ground, as they swoosh across a city after dark. Do you want to find and collect the coins, or strive for a high score? How fast can you go?
